common.no_clans_found: Ingen klaner ble funnet i vår database for argumentet du spesifiserte.
common.no_clans_linked: Ingen klaner er knyttet til denne serveren. Hvorfor ikke linke noen?
common.clan_limit: Det maksimale antallet klaner er nådd. Vurder å støtte oss på [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) for å legge til mer enn to klaner.
common.clan_verification:
We need to ensure that you are a leader or co-leader of this clan. Please verify your player account with the API token.
Use the `/verify` command to verify your player account. The API token is available in the Game settings.

Alternatively, you can add a temporary code `{{code}}` in your clan description. Then wait 1-2 min and execute this command again. Once it is verified, you can safely remove the code.
common.no_option: Something went wrong while executing this command. (option not found)
common.no_data: No data is available at this moment. We are still collecting!
common.no_clan_data: No data is available for {{clan}}. We are still collecting!
common.no_clan_members: ‎{{clan}} does not have any clan members.

component.expired: This component is no longer active. Run the command again.
component.unauthorized: You must run the command to interact with components.

common.no_clan_tag: You must provide a clan tag to execute this command!
common.no_player_tag: You must provide a player tag to execute this command!
common.guild_unauthorized: This server is not authorized for {{clan}}. Use `/setup` command to link the clan.

status_code.400: The client provided incorrect parameters for the request.
status_code.403: API token does not grant access to the requested resource.
status_code.404: No matches were found for the specified tag.
status_code.429: The request was throttled because the number of requests was above the threshold defined for the used API token.
status_code.500: An unknown error happened when handling the request.
status_code.503: Service is temporarily unavailable because of maintenance.

create.too_many_clans:
The clan selection menu is not available for more than 25 clans. {{clans}} clans were selected automatically!
To create a reminder for specific clans, pass clan tags or aliases through the 'clans' option while executing the command.
